comment: Best prof. here. She carries the whole MAcc tax program.
Great prof.  Very kind, patient, thorough, prompt to respond to emails.   I love this lady! :)    .
Dr. Schafer is a wonderful professor. She is very knowledgeable and helpful! The tests are hard, but as long as you know the material you'll do fine!

There are a lot of great Accounting professors at KSU, but Prof Schafer is the best (tied with Prof Heather Hermanson).  Her class is always well organized and structured, and her delivery of the material is perfect.  A difficult class with difficult tests, but she's the best there is at teaching it.
The material is kind of tough, but the way she structures the points is super fair.  She is cute and a great teacher.  It's a no-brainer.  Take her.

This professor is very sweet and want her class to learn. She is a very smart professor, so she teaches as if the students are on her level. She does go through explaining the material a bit too fast. But she very understanding and try to grade as fair as possible. I know a lot of students who had taken this class twice because this is class is HAR
Know how to teach, however,her exams are not easy.
